alert.note: Alert for Southern Cayuga (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 15 at 3:26AM EST until December 16 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM THIS MORNING TO 7 PM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 7 to 11 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Southern Cayuga county. * WHEN...From 7 AM this morning to 7 PM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will be heavy and wet which could bring down branches. Power outages are possible. The highest snow amounts will be across the highest terrain.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
